workshoptitle: Working with ERP Cloud Business Events in OCI Integration

tutorials.title: Introduction
tutorials.description: The ERP Cloud Business Event Workshop will cover the recommended steps to complete an end-to-end use case based on ERP Cloud Business Events in OCI Application Integration.

tutorials.title: Getting Started
tutorials.description: Prerequisites for LiveLabs (Oracle-owned tenancies). The title of the lab and the Contents Menu title (the title above) match for Prerequisite lab. This lab is always first.

tutorials.title: Provision an OCI Integration Instance
tutorials.description: Follow these steps to create a new OCI Integration service instance

tutorials.title: Need Help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
